actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the special motor fuels excise tax on water-phased hydrocarbon fuel emulsions shall be based on their Btu content relative to gasoline.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the special motor fuels excise tax shall be 12.66 cents per gallon in the case of any water-phased hydrocarbon fuel. Defines the term "water-phased hydrocarbon fuel" to mean any liquid consisting of a hydrocarbon base and water if not less than 20 percent (by volume) of the liquid consists of water.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the special motor fuels excise tax on water-phased hydrocarbon fuel emulsions shall be based on their Btu content relative to gasoline.
